parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time, in the format of yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' . The time range cannot exceed 6 hours.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.
- Pages start from page 1.
- Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of rows to return on each page.
- Maximum value: 100.
- Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time, in the format of yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'.
